Sentencas: The performance of electrolyte supported solid oxide fuel cell is impaired primarily due to poisoning of electrodes due to contaminants generated from the metallic components of the stack.
Titulo: Development of chromium barrier coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ferritic stainless steels are commonly used as stack material under severe operating conditions of SOFC environment.
Titulo: Development of chromium barrier coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the high chromium content in this type of steels tends to form gaseous oxides and/or hydroxides which volatilize and condense on various components of stack assembly, particularly cathodes, resulting in performance degradation of the system.
Titulo: Development of chromium barrier coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two types of barrier coatings have been developed to minimize the chromium volatilization.
Titulo: Development of chromium barrier coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In one case, coatings of oxide species were deposited by processes such as thermal and plasma spraying, and the other is by diffusion coating process such as aluminizing.
Titulo: Development of chromium barrier coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This presentation will describe various barrier coatings, barrier properties provided by the coatings, and transpiration measurements adopted to evaluate the efficiency of those coatings.
Titulo: Development of chromium barrier coatings for solid oxide fuel cells
